languages.text: "Ваша подсказка помогла блюстителям обнаружить улику. В одном из вентиляционных отверстий мы нашли окровавленную синт-шинель. Подобные синт-шинели входят в снаряжение каждого блюстителя на судне".
"Your insightful suggestion helped the enforcers to locate the evidence. In fact, we found a bloody synth-coat in one of the vents — a standard issue included in every enforcer outfit on the ship."
languages.original_text: "Ваша подсказка помогла блюстителям обнаружить улику. В одном из вентиляционных отверстий мы нашли окровавленную синт-шинель. Подобные синт-шинели входят в снаряжение каждого блюстителя на судне".

traits.locale_text: "Your insightful suggestion helped the enforcers locate the evidence. We found a bloody synth-coat in one of the vents. Such synth-coats are included in the outfit of every enforcer on the ship."
"Your insightful suggestion helped the enforcers locate the evidence. We found a bloody synth-coat in one of the vents. Such synth-coats are included in the outfit of every enforcer on the ship."
"Your insightful suggestion helped the enforcers to locate the evidence. In fact, we found a bloody synth-coat in one of the vents — a standard issue included in every enforcer outfit on the ship."

"Your insightful suggestion helped the enforcers to locate the evidence. In fact, we found a bloody synth-coat in one of the vents — a standard issue included in every enforcer outfit on the ship."

languages.text: "Euer Rat hat den Enforcern geholfen, den Beweis sicherzustellen. Tatsächlich fanden wir einen blutigen Synthetikmantel in einer der Lüftungen ... ein Kleidungsstück, das zur Standardausrüstung aller Enforcer auf diesem Schiff zählt."
languages.original_text: "Your insightful suggestion helped the enforcers to locate the evidence. In fact, we found a bloody synth-coat in one of the vents — a standard issue included in every enforcer outfit on the ship."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Rat hat den Enforcern geholfen, den Beweis sicherzustellen. Tatsächlich fanden wir einen blutigen Synthetikmantel in einer der Lüftungen ... ein Kleidungsstück, das zur Standardausrüstung aller Enforcer auf diesem Schiff zählt."

languages.text: « Votre suggestion a permis aux prévôts de localiser les preuves. Nous avons d'ailleurs trouvé, dans l'une des bouches d'aération, un manteau synthétique qui fait partie de l'uniforme des prévôts. Sauf que celui-ci était taché de sang. »
languages.original_text: "Your insightful suggestion helped the enforcers to locate the evidence. In fact, we found a bloody synth-coat in one of the vents — a standard issue included in every enforcer outfit on the ship."

traits.locale_text: « Votre suggestion a permis aux prévôts de localiser les preuves. Nous avons d'ailleurs trouvé, dans l'une des bouches d'aération, un manteau synthétique qui fait partie de l'uniforme des prévôts. Sauf que celui-ci était taché de sang. »

languages.text: «Su perspicaz sugerencia ayudó a los guardias a localizar las pruebas. De hecho, hallamos un abrigo sintético manchado de sangre en un conducto de ventilación; es una prenda de uso reglamentario que se proporciona a todos los guardias de la nave».
languages.original_text: "Your insightful suggestion helped the enforcers to locate the evidence. In fact, we found a bloody synth-coat in one of the vents — a standard issue included in every enforcer outfit on the ship."

traits.locale_text: «Su perspicaz sugerencia ayudó a los guardias a localizar las pruebas. De hecho, hallamos un abrigo sintético manchado de sangre en un conducto de ventilación; es una prenda de uso reglamentario que se proporciona a todos los guardias de la nave».

languages.text: 「あなたの鋭いご提案のおかげでエンフォーサーが証拠の在り処を突き止めることができました。実は、通気口の一つで血まみれのシンセコートを発見したのです。この船の全エンフォーサーの制服に含まれる標準的な支給品です」
languages.original_text: "Your insightful suggestion helped the enforcers to locate the evidence. In fact, we found a bloody synth-coat in one of the vents — a standard issue included in every enforcer outfit on the ship."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの鋭いご提案のおかげでエンフォーサーが証拠の在り処を突き止めることができました。実は、通気口の一つで血まみれのシンセコートを発見したのです。この船の全エンフォーサーの制服に含まれる標準的な支給品です」

languages.text: “您的真知灼见帮助执法者找到了证据。事实上，我们在某个通风口里发现了一件沾了血的合成外套，船上所有执法者都有这样的制式外套。”
languages.original_text: "Your insightful suggestion helped the enforcers to locate the evidence. In fact, we found a bloody synth-coat in one of the vents — a standard issue included in every enforcer outfit on the ship."

traits.locale_text: “您的真知灼见帮助执法者找到了证据。事实上，我们在某个通风口里发现了一件沾了血的合成外套，船上所有执法者都有这样的制式外套。”

languages.text: "Aydınlatıcı öneriniz, infazcıların kanıtları bulmalarına yardımcı oldu. Aslına bakarsanız havalandırmalardan birinde kan içinde kalmış bir sentetik kaban bulduk. Tüm infazcı üniformalarının bir parçası olan standart kıyafetlerden."
languages.original_text: "Your insightful suggestion helped the enforcers to locate the evidence. In fact, we found a bloody synth-coat in one of the vents — a standard issue included in every enforcer outfit on the ship."
